description: Detects suspicious "epmap" connection to a remote computer via remote procedure call (RPC)
author: frack113
Tim Shelton (fps)
name: Suspicious Epmap Connection
query: (event.category:network AND (Protocol:tcp AND winlog.event_data.Initiated:true AND destination.port:135) AND (NOT ((process.executable:(/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Aa][Mm][Aa][Zz][Oo][Nn]\\[Ss][Ss][Mm]\\[Uu][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Ee]\\[Aa][Mm][Aa][Zz][Oo][Nn]\-[Ss][Ss][Mm]\-[Aa][Gg][Ee][Nn][Tt]\-[Uu][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Ee][Rr].*/)) OR (NOT _exists_:process.executable.text) OR (process.executable.text:) OR (process.executable:/\<[Uu][Nn][Kk][Nn][Oo][Ww][Nn]\ [Pp][Rr][Oo][Cc][Ee][Ss][Ss]\>/))))
